ESP8266_IoT.plaiveLastUploadState: Check if ESP8266 successfully uploaded data to Plaive
ESP8266_IoT.plaiveState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to Plaive
ESP8266_IoT.setDataPlaive: Connect to Plaive and set data.
ESP8266_IoT.setDataThingSpeak: Connect to ThingSpeak and set data.
ESP8266_IoT.thingSpeakState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to ThingSpeak
ESP8266_IoT.tsLastUploadState: Check if ESP8266 successfully uploaded data to ThingSpeak
ESP8266_IoT.uploadDataPlaive: upload data. It would not upload anything if it failed to connect to Wifi or ThingSpeak.
ESP8266_IoT.uploadDataThingSpeak: upload data. It would not upload anything if it failed to connect to Wifi or ThingSpeak.
ESP8266_IoT.wifiState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to Wifi
